Preterit.turoyo: Aʕ ʕwone šridi bǝṯr u ḥmoro. Our sheep followed the donkey. İlyas p.c

tokens.value: Aʕ ʕwone  šridi bǝṯr u ḥmoro. Our sheep followed the donkey.

Preterit.text: Aʕ ʕwone šridi bǝṯr u ḥmoro. Our sheep followed the donkey. (İlyas p.c)

Preterit.turoyo: Di naqla d Čalabiyo ǝzzewa lu ḥarb mǝšrodiwa maṯe zlamat bǝṯre. Each time Čalabiyo went to war two hundred men followed him. İlyas p.c

tokens.value: Di naqla d Čalabiyo ǝzzewa lu ḥarb
mǝšrodiwa maṯe zlamat bǝṯre. Each time Čalabiyo went to war two hundred men followed him.

Preterit.text: Di naqla d Čalabiyo ǝzzewa lu ḥarb, mǝšrodiwa maṯe zlamat bǝṯre. Each time Čalabiyo went to war two hundred men followed him. (İlyas p.c)

Preterit.turoyo: Hedi šridi lu=mal di=arʕo. Then they went after the riches of the land. 2018_07_08_au_003_NE_1F about the pillage of a village in Sayfo
